author: brane
msg: Create branch for Berkeley DB filesystem backend fixes.

author: ehu
msg: Note: This commit contains changes related to svn_wc_translated_file2.
More elaborate changes to that function are still under discussion
with Julian Foad and Malcolm Rowe.
(svn_subst_eol_style_normalize): Remove, making all details for eol
to request eol translation even for cases where it's not the default.
Also extend the doc string and incorporate the functionality from
to force translation to succeed, even when inconsistent eols are
there's a mechanism to marshal the argument to svn_wc_translated_file2 now.
